reviews.review: The replay value of this game is fantastic. I've been playing this for a decade on and off and it never gets old.
playing with your friends in an internet cafe is like the best thing ever

Game is great, you can also see your legs in FP.
^Best thing about it!

6 gun types.
High Tier:

-Pistol / Pistols

-Hunting Rifle

-Assault Rifle / M16

-Semi-Automatic Shotgun

Low tier:
-Pump Shotgun

-Uzi / Sub-Machine Gun


You can decide whether or not you wanna buy it.
Personally, it's worth it if you bought the bundle.
Still looks good after all these years.
Este juego es tremendo y fue parte de mi infancia
Im been playing this game since i was 3 the re playablility is great
Me encantan los personajes y escenarios que nos presenta el juego.La verdad un juegazo que se disfruta mas con amigos.
el juego es bastante intenso, pero ayuda para liberar tension jajaja, pero si eres mas de "campear" armate de paciencia.
bill fro m left fore dead

Even though all of this content is redundant since L4D2 ported it into the engine update, I still wanted to play it how I originally remember it.  There is a difference playing them back to back, the gameplay feels slightly different here, with a more mobile style of shooting.  You can tell that they changed up the style of play to be more guided in the second game, but I still really enjoy the weird openness of these campaigns. I still would say this is a good time, just know that L4D2 has these campaigns too.

Left 4 Dead is Valve Software at their greatest. You can play Solo or Multiple player with Campaign mode in Solo and Co-op or play Versus. Very good and the best out of the series.

amo este juego,la verdad sus personajes y la historia del juego es muy buena lo recomiendo 10/10
